audioJson.name: DTRS
audioJson.aka: DTRS, Digital Tape Recording System, DA-88
audioJson.fact1: Audio data stored in this format on Hi8 video cassettes allowed for up to 108 minutes of continuous recording per tape
audioJson.fact2: In 1995, this format won an Emmy award for technical excellence
audioJson.fact3: This format could record up to 16 tracks
